creator: dan.zhao@drkw.com
text:
"<tar ...> </tar>"  command doe not preserve the file access right. And 
the "mode" subcommand does not work properly.

The default action for <tar> should keep the directory and file access right.

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
It is not possible for Java, through the APIs provided to access file 
permissions. Therefore Ant has no way to discover the file permissions when it 
is constructing the tar file.

The <mode> nested element is provided to allow this information to be provided 
by the build file author. How does mode not work properly?

creator: holtdl@yahoo.com
text: *** Bug 7623 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
